glsa.title: AdPlug: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple heap and buffer overflows exist in AdPlug.

background.p: AdPlug is a free, cross-platform, and hardware-independent AdLib sound player library.

description.p: AdPlug is vulnerable to buffer and heap overflows when processing the following types of files: CFF, MTK, DMO, U6M, DTM, and S3M.

impact.p: By enticing a user to load a specially crafted file, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running AdPlug.

workaround.p: There are no known workarounds at this time.
